item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率下滑，30 年期贷款利率降至 6.26
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率继续下降，达到了近一年来的最低点。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US extended their decline, reaching the lowest point in almost a year.】

item.title: 阿布扎比斥资数十亿美元推动能源发展初期遭遇挫折
item.description: 一年前，阿布扎比成立了一家备受瞩目的能源投资公司，希望在全球范围内部署数十亿美元的交易。虽然 XRG 早期在美国和非洲取得了成功，但其最大的努力本周宣告失败，另一项交易也悬而未决，这凸显了其成为全球能源巨头所面临的障碍。【原文：A year ago, Abu Dhabi launched a high-profile energy investment firm hoping to deploy billions of dollars on deals around the world. While there were early successes in the US and Africa, XRG’s biggest effort yet fell apart this week and another deal hangs in the balance, underscoring its hurdles to becoming a global energy behemoth.】

item.title: 投资者为何对黄金爱不释手？
item.description: 几个世纪以来，黄金一直是政治和经济不稳定时期的避风港资产。黄金作为一种可靠的高价值商品，可以方便地运输并在任何地方出售，当其他一切都处于动荡之中时，黄金给人一种安全感。【原文：For centuries, gold has been the go-to haven asset in times of political and economic uncertainty. Its status as a reliably high-value commodity that can be transported easily and sold anywhere offers a sense of safety when everything else is in turmoil.】

item.title: JB Straubel 称电池可提高天然气发电厂的效率
item.description: 特斯拉公司联合创始人 JB Straubel 说，电池可以使天然气发电厂更高效、更经济，尤其是在为数据中心供电时。【原文：Batteries can make natural gas power plants more efficient and economic, particularly when they’re powering data centers, Tesla Inc. co-founder JB Straubel said.】

item.title: 大豆因美国需求担忧而下跌，中国保持观望
item.description: 大豆下滑，原因是中国继续抑制从美国供应商的采购，对美国出口需求的持续担忧。【原文：Soybeans slid on continuing concerns over demand for US exports as China keeps holding back on purchases from American suppliers.】

item.title: 英特尔债券因竞争对手英伟达的投资而走强
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）的债券周四大涨，因为英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）表示将向该公司投资 50 亿美元，并与其联合开发半导体，这一出人意料的举动将有助于支撑这家陷入困境的芯片制造商。【原文：Intel Corp.’s bonds rallied on Thursday after Nvidia Corp. said it would invest $5 billion in the company and jointly develop semiconductors with it, a surprise move that will help prop up the ailing chipmaker.】

item.title: 阿根廷债券创一年最低，米莱压力增大
item.description: 由于哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的政府所面临的压力不断增加，阿根廷美元债券周四在新兴市场中出现了一些最严重的损失，使其有望创下自四月份以来最长的单周跌势。【原文：Argentina’s dollar bonds posted some of the worst losses in emerging markets Thursday, putting them on track for the longest weekly rout since April as pressure on President Javier Milei’s government continues to build.】

item.title: 法国风电反弹将推动发电量增长至 20 年最低点
item.description: 法国准备增加 20 年来最少量的风力发电能力，因为反移民的国民联盟党领导的对涡轮机的反弹加剧了悬而未决的议会所造成的政治不稳定。【原文：France is poised to add the smallest amount of wind-power capacity in 20 years as a backlash against turbines led by the anti-immigration National Rally party compounds political instability caused by a hung Parliament.】

item.title: 据说美国银行将购买桑坦德银行 1 亿欧元的房地产贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，美国银行同意从桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）购买价值约 1 亿欧元（1.18 亿美元）的西班牙房地产贷款组合。【原文：Bank of America Corp. agreed to buy a Spanish real estate loan portfolio worth about €100 million ($118 million) from Banco Santander SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定 PDVSA 债券有效，为出售 Citgo 扫清障碍
item.description: 纽约一名联邦法官确认了委内瑞拉国有石油公司发行的几种债券的有效性，从而消除了法院下令拍卖 Citgo 母公司过程中的一个重大不确定因素。【原文：A federal judge in New York confirmed the validity of several bonds issued by Venezuela’s state-owned oil company, removing a major uncertainty in the court-ordered auction of Citgo’s parent.】

item.title: 埃及称被盗法老手镯在出售 4000 美元后被熔化
item.description: 埃及称，在开罗一家博物馆的千年金手镯被盗、以约 4000 美元的价格出售并熔化后，四名嫌疑人被捕。【原文：Egypt said four suspects were arrested after a millennia-old golden bracelet was stolen from a Cairo museum, sold for about $4,000 and melted down.】

item.title: 沃伦要求了解 Binance 遵守 2023 年和解协议的详细情况
item.description: 参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）正就全球最大的加密货币交易所 Binance Holdings Ltd. 是否遵守 2023 年与联邦检察官就洗钱和违反制裁行为达成的协议向司法部施压。【原文：Senator Elizabeth Warren is pressing the Justice Department on whether the world’s biggest crypto exchange, Binance Holdings Ltd., is adhering to a 2023 agreement with federal prosecutors over money-laundering and sanctions violations.】

item.title: 私人信贷公司将上市公司视为下一个目标
item.description: 多年来，私人信贷公司一直专注于为私募股权收购或资金来源有限的紧密控股公司提供融资。现在，它们开始瞄准下一个领域：希望实现资金组合多样化的大型上市公司。【原文：For years, private credit firms have focused on financing private equity buyouts or closely held companies that had limited access to capital. Now, they are zeroing in on their next frontier: Large public companies that want to diversify their funding mix.】

item.title: 埃克森称俄罗斯谈判重点是被征用的萨哈林 1 号资产
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司首席执行官达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）在接受采访时说，埃克森美孚公司与俄罗斯的谈判主要集中在追回因俄罗斯 2022 年征用其萨哈林-1 号石油项目而造成的损失。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp.’s talks with Russia are focused on reclaiming losses incurred by the country’s 2022 expropriation of its Sakhalin-1 oil venture, Chief Executive Officer Darren Woods said in an interview.】

item.title: Kosters 预测降息将刺激私人信贷基金销售
item.description: Antares Capital 的 Olga Kosters 认为，美联储周三的降息和宏观经济的不确定性可能会引发私人信贷基金投资者的抛售，他们希望重新平衡自己的投资组合。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s interest rate cut Wednesday and macroeconomic uncertainty could trigger selling by investors in private credit funds who are looking to rebalance their portfolios, according to Antares Capital’s Olga Kosters.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会主席称金梅尔的评论似乎误导了公众
item.description: 联邦通信委员会主席布兰登-卡尔（Brendan Carr）说，吉米-基梅尔（Jimmy Kimmel）关于保守派活动家查理-柯克（Charlie Kirk）被枪杀事件的评论 "似乎在一个重要事实上误导了公众"。【原文：Federal Communications Commission Chairman Brendan Carr said Jimmy Kimmel’s comments about the shooting of conservative activist Charlie Kirk “appeared to mislead the public about a significant fact.”】

item.title: 美联储降息为跃跃欲试的美国 IPO 候选者开绿灯
item.description: 美联储的降息为那些等待绿灯的私营公司进入美国首次公开募股市场扫清了障碍。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s interest rate cut has cleared the way for private companies that were waiting for a green light to jump into the US initial public offering market.】

item.title: 失业救济人数影响降息前景，国债反弹受阻
item.description: 在每周就业数据使人们对今年进一步降息的前景产生怀疑之后，预期周三美联储将降息的国债市场涨势碰壁。【原文：The Treasury market rally in anticipation of Wednesday’s Federal Reserve interest-rate cut hit a wall after weekly employment data cast doubt on the outlook for further reductions this year.】

item.title: 英伟达交易后，美国政府持有的英特尔股份价值 140 亿美元
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的一笔意外投资引发这家芯片制造商股价近四十年来的最大涨幅之后，美国政府对英特尔公司的押注正在获得丰厚回报。【原文：The US government’s bet on Intel Corp. is paying off in a big way after a surprise investment from Nvidia Corp. sparked the biggest rally in the chipmaker’s shares in nearly four decades.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的突破让灰度公司推出首只多代币 ETF
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会为第一只捆绑了一篮子加密货币的交易所交易基金扫清了障碍，这标志着该行业在经历了主要限于比特币和以太币的审批之后取得了突破性进展。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission cleared the way for the first exchange-traded fund bundling a basket of cryptocurrencies, marking a breakthrough for the industry after a swath of approvals largely limited to Bitcoin and Ether.】

item.title: 停电限制供应，汽油市场夏末走强
item.description: 由于炼油厂停工限制了供应，全球汽油市场在夏末表现出不同寻常的强劲势头，即使在一年中通常对道路燃料需求减弱的时候也是如此。【原文：Global gasoline markets are showing unusual late-summer strength as refinery outages limit supply, even at a time of year when demand for the road fuel usually wanes.】

item.title: 住房危机迫使更多澳大利亚人退休后租房居住
item.description: 租房的澳大利亚退休人员比以往任何时候都多，因为住房成本的飙升和工作年限的延长暴露了澳大利亚备受赞誉的养老金制度的局限性。【原文：More Australian retirees are renting than ever, as soaring housing costs and longer working lives expose the limits of the nation’s much-lauded pension system.】

item.title: OpenAI 修复了使 Gmail 数据面临风险的 ChatGPT 安全漏洞
item.description: 据网络公司 Radware 的研究人员称，OpenAI 修补了一个 ChatGPT 安全漏洞，该漏洞可能允许黑客从用户那里提取 Gmail 数据。【原文：OpenAI patched a ChatGPT security flaw that could have allowed hackers to extract Gmail data from its users, according to researchers at cyber firm Radware.】

item.title: 贝利称英国央行降息尚未结束
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，英国央行的降息周期尚未结束，并指出就业市场降温可能带来的风险。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said the UK central bank is not done with its interest-rate cutting cycle yet, pointing to possible risks in the cooling jobs market.】

item.title: 领取失业救济金的加拿大人人数为三年来最高
item.description: 接受政府援助的加拿大失业人数达到了自 2022 年 2 月以来的最高水平。【原文：The number of unemployed Canadians receiving government assistance has reached the highest level since February 2022.】

item.title: 特拉维斯-卡兰尼克的云厨公司为中东部门的首次公开募股增加了银行业务
item.description: 云厨（CloudKitchens）是优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.据熟悉内情的人士透露，该公司已为其中东业务的首次公开募股挑选了更多银行。【原文：CloudKitchens, a startup run by former Uber Technologies Inc. Chief Executive Officer Travis Kalanick, has picked additional banks for an initial public offering of its Middle Eastern operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长李明博建议国际货币基金组织权衡下限定向贷款
item.description: 韩国央行行长李昌镛建议国际货币基金组织考虑在低利率被证明效果不佳时，将定向贷款和有条件的前瞻性指导作为其针对经济体的政策框架的一部分。【原文：Bank of Korea Governor Rhee Chang Yong proposed that the International Monetary Fund consider targeted lending and conditional forward guidance as part of its policy framework for economies when low interest rates are proving less effective.】

item.title: 美联储降息后大科技股和小盘股上涨
item.description: 美国股市周四跳涨，因为在美联储今年首次降息并预示未来将有更多降息后，华尔街弥漫着风险偏好情绪。【原文：US equities jumped Thursday as a risk-on sentiment permeated Wall Street after the Federal Reserve delivered its first interest rate cut this year and signaled more ahead.】

item.title: 据说 ADS 正在就收购诺玛公司价值 10 亿美元的水务部门进行深入谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Advanced Drainage Systems 公司正在就收购德国诺玛集团（Norma Group SE）的水管理部门进行深入谈判，交易价值约为 8.5 亿欧元（10 亿美元）。【原文：Advanced Drainage Systems Inc. is in advanced talks to buy the water management unit of Germany’s Norma Group SE in a deal valued at about €850 million ($1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马里上诉法官释放被拘留巴里克员工的命令
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，马里检察官已就法官下令保释巴里克矿业公司四名员工一事提出上诉。【原文：Malian prosecutors have appealed a judge’s order to release four Barrick Mining Corp.’s employees on bail, according to people familiar with the matter.】
